lines.text: It would seem so, are you hurt?
No not much, we should get to somewhere safe
This brings me back to the question... Where are we?
You came through the portal right? Welcome to a new dimension!
What??? No way, that sounds impossible!
Well you are the one who stepped through the portal, where did you think it'd lead?
I only came through because... JAY! We need to find my partner, he was abducted by those people!
I thought that may have been the kind of operation being conducted here. We will get him back but we can't help if we are captured. Come let's get somewhere safe.
